name: BALLZ (itch) (Floky)
description:
BALLZ is my first Game Dev project, I use it to learn everything there is to learn about game development.  I made this Demo in 7 days.

The future of the game will be a platforming game where speedrunning and skill play a major role!

For now, I only have the first level done, it's basically the tutorial area but should give a good feel of what the game is going to be!

 Hope to hear some feedback! :D

I'll soon be posting videos about my journey on my youtube channel: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw90yhJXRhN6W5ahGJtFQLQ
